ygData.subject: Re: smith
ygData.msgSnippet: Smithing is profitable only when ya skill is about 80...and yes..80[To make Banded Mail] Training from guild allows u up to 27pts which is still only abt 10%
ygData.messageBody:
Smithing is profitable only when ya skill is about 80...and yes..80[To make
Banded Mail] Training from guild allows u up to 27pts which is still only
abt 10% to make banded stuff so u would have to keep making
skwers,sharpening weapons,making other loads of stuff before you could
actually start earning money from it[and be able to spend up to 100pp in ya
practice]

However,once skill hits 75-80,you should have about 70% of success rate on
banded which from that onwards,you would be a pretty sought after smither
which everyone around u buying banded from u..hehe..

Cost Price of ..let say Banded Tunic is roughly 10pp,and considering you
succeed,you could sell around 25pp to 30pp[standard price].Anyway,my
smithing also aint that great :P ..juz found out this from smithers around.
